scripts.dev: echo 'No app yet. Add Next.js or your app framework'
scripts.lint: if command -v eslint >/dev/null 2>&1; then eslint .; else echo 'ESLint not installed - skipping lint'; fi
scripts.lint:fix: if command -v eslint >/dev/null 2>&1; then eslint . --fix; else echo 'ESLint not installed - skipping lint:fix'; fi
scripts.format: if command -v prettier >/dev/null 2>&1; then prettier --write .; else echo 'Prettier not installed - skipping format'; fi
scripts.format:check: if command -v prettier >/dev/null 2>&1; then prettier --check .; else echo 'Prettier not installed - skipping format:check'; fi
scripts.typecheck: if [ -f tsconfig.json ]; then tsc -p tsconfig.json --noEmit; else echo 'No TypeScript config found - skipping typecheck'; fi
scripts.test: if command -v vitest >/dev/null 2>&1; then vitest run; else echo 'Vitest not installed - skipping test'; fi
scripts.test:watch: if command -v vitest >/dev/null 2>&1; then vitest; else echo 'Vitest not installed - skipping test:watch'; fi
scripts.secrets:check: bash -lc 'if git ls-files | grep -E "^\.env(\..*)?$"; then echo "Error: .env files must not be committed" >&2; exit 1; fi'
scripts.env:check: npm run env:validate && npm run env:health
scripts.repo:check: npm run repo:health && npm run check
scripts.check: npm run format:check && npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test && npm run secrets:check
scripts.pre-pr: npm run check && npm run build
